scripts.build: npm run process-elm-files && npm run process-html-files && npm run process-scss-files && npm run process-js-files
scripts.debug: npm run debug-process-elm-files && npm run process-html-files && npm run process-scss-files && npm run process-js-files
scripts.process-elm-files: elm make source/scripts/Main.elm --output=public/scripts/Main.js --optimize && uglifyjs public/scripts/Main.js --compress 'pure_funcs="F2,F3,F4,F5,F6,F7,F8,F9,A2,A3,A4,A5,A6,A7,A8,A9",pure_getters=true,keep_fargs=false,unsafe_comps=true,unsafe=true,passes=2' --output=public/scripts/Main.js && uglifyjs public/scripts/Main.js --mangle --output=public/scripts/Main.js
